name: Connect to Your Values
description: Values are foundational. They inform the goals you set, the actions you take and the project / organisation / life you build. You know your values are important, but sometimes it's difficult to actually know what your values are. It can all feel a bit abstract.This free Notion template contains reflective exercises and easy-to-use systems to help you identify and connect with what matters.It will suit anyone looking for some structure and support when thinking about their core values.Whatâ€™s incl
features: Reflection questions for individuals and groups - helping you see your values in action; 300 values to choose from, and the option to add your own; Simple and streamlined systems to select, group, and prioritise your values
